ComicInfo.Title: Top 10 Predictions for 1998; Gourde o' th' Bungle; How the Grinch Downsized Christmas; Diary of the Last Draft Pick; A Christmas Tale; Cracked's 1998 Calendar Concepts That Didn't Quite Make It; If Beavis and Butt-Head Were in Classic Christmas Films; Chelsea Clinton's Freshman Yearbook; The Little Boy Drummer; Sports World Tamagotchis; You'll Be Buying It; A Charlie Brown Politically Correct Holiday Season; Aggressive Advertising; Rudolph Rednose, the Reindeer; Movie Ideas Before They Got Them Right!; Cracked Takes a Look at MTV!
